==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han simp|鰻|f=魚|t=鱼}}.

In current form, {{Han compound|魚|t1=fish|曼|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a kind of fish. Note that 曼 has meaning of “long”, hence connotations of “a long fish, an eel”.
